Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on bedbug-related violations in dwellings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend local law number 50 for the year 2015, relating to the preservation of certain hotels, a moratorium and report relating to such preservation, and the expiration and repeal of such amendments, in relation to extending the effective period of the provisions of such local law and requiring a supplemental report relating to such preservation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend local law number 50 for the year 2015.
